amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-2 to remove the prohibition on the Secretary of the Department of Housing and Urban Development's ability to waive requirements related to the environment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rice (SC) amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Rice (SC).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rice (SC) amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.
